Intervention: · Green Tea Extract Supplement (GTE): Two capsules of green tea extract twice a day after breakfast and dinner for one year. GTE was a decaffeinated green tea extract, and each capsule contained a total of 328.8 ± 28.9 mg of catechins, of which 210.7 ± 11.0 mg of EGCG.
Placebo: Two placebo capsules twice a day after breakfast and dinner for one year. Placebo capsules contained maltodextrin, cellulose, and magnesium stearate.
Eligibility: Incorporation criteria:
Signed informed consent
Healthy menopausal women aged 50 to 70
"Heterogeniously dense" (51-75% glandular) or "extremely dense" (>75% glandular) breasts
To avoid the consumption of green tea for 1 year
- Exclusion criteria:
Positive serological markers of hepatitis B or hepatitis C infections
Increased liver enzyme levels
Recent (within 6 months) or modification treatment of the current hormone or hormone, including systemic hormone replacement therapy, SERMS and aromatase inhibitors
Currently smoking cigarettes or other tobacco products
BMI <19 or >40 kg/m2
Change in weight > 10 lbs in the previous year
• History of breast cancer or proliferative breast disease
Regular consumption of > 7 alcoholic beverages/kilometre
Regular consumption of green tea (>1 cup/wk)
The recent use (within 6 months) or current use of chemopreventive agents such as tamoxifen, raloxifene or aromatase inhibitors
Participation in any study of weight loss or weight gain
At present, take Methotrexate or Enbrel
History of ovarian cancer
Any form of cancer in the last 5 years
Presence of implants
Results: The percentage of mammographic density was measured on digital images using a computer-assisted and quantitative method.
Title of the arm/group: Green tea extract

Two capsules of green tea extract twice a day after breakfast and dinner for one year. GTE was a decaffeinated green tea extract, and each capsule contained a total of 328.8 28.9 mg of catechins, of which 210.7 11.0 mg of EGCG.
Unit of measure: Percentage Percentage Mammographic density at base: 22.71 (21.39 to 24.10)
Percentage of mammographic density at month 12: 22.09 (20.77 to 23.50)
Title of the arm/group: Sugar pill
Description of the arm/group: Placebo: Two placebo capsules twice a day after breakfast and dinner for one year.
Unit of measure: Percentage Percentage Mammographic density at base: 21.84 (20.59-23.17)
Percentage of mammographic density at month 12: 21.13 (19.88 to 22.47)
